alert.note: Alert for Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Seminole, southeastern Orange and north central Osceola Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Hart, or near Narcoossee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Oviedo, Saint Cloud and Wedgefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
